responses: Welcome to Green University of Bangladesh! How can I help you today?
Hello! I am the GUB AI Assistant. Ask me about admissions, fees, or departments.

patterns: How to go to Green University?
responses: The Permanent Campus is located at Purbachal American City, Kanchan, Rupganj, Narayanganj. We also have a city information center at Begum Rokeya Sarani, Dhaka.
We offer BSc in CSE, EEE, Textile Engineering, BBA, LLB (Hons), English, Sociology, and Journalism (JMC).
For BSc in CSE, the total cost ranges from roughly 5,26,000 BDT to 7,14,500 BDT depending on your SSC/HSC GPA results and waivers.

patterns: How much to pay during admission?
responses: The Admission Fee is Tk. 20,000 (Non-refundable). You also need to pay a registration fee of roughly Tk. 5,350 for the first semester.
Yes! We offer waivers up to 100% based on your SSC/HSC GPA. Freedom Fighter children and siblings of current students also get special waivers.
You can apply online at https://applyonline.green.edu.bd or visit our admission office at the Purbachal Campus.
GUB has a vibrant club life! You can join the Debating Club (GUDC), Cultural Club, EEE Club, Computer Club, or the Photography Club.
We follow the standard UGC grading system. A+ is 4.00 (80% and above), and the passing grade is D (40%).
